definitions: A stock or supply of money, materials, staff, and other assets that can be drawn on by a person or organization in order to function effectively.
A country's collective means of support or defense.
An act or course of action to which a person may resort in difficult circumstances.
A natural feature or phenomenon that enhances the quality of human life.
examples: The library is a valuable resource.
The country's natural resources are abundant.
She was a woman of great resource.
